verses.1: Jesu in a thugen a man khit ciangin Galilee gam panin pai khia-in Judea gam Jordan gun gal khat ah a pai hi.
verses.2: Mihon tampi in amah zui uh a, tua munah cinate a damsak hi.
verses.3: Farisi mite pawl khat Jesu kiangah hong pai uh a, amah a mawhsak theih nading uh a deihna-un, “Thu khat peuhpeuh hangin zi mak theih ding mah ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
verses.4: Jesu in, “Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘A kipat cil-in a Piangsak pa in numei le pasal a bawl hi,’ ci hi.
verses.5: Tua ciangin, ‘Hih thu hangin pasal in a nu le a pa nusia-in a zi tawh kigawm dinga, amau tegel pum khat a bang ding uh hi,’ ci-in na kigelh hi.
verses.6: Tua ahih manin amaute nih hi nawn loin khat ahi ta uh hi. Tua ahih manin Pasian in a gawm sa mite, kuamah in khen kei tahen,” ci-in a dawng hi.
verses.7: Tua ciangin Farisi mite in, “Tua ahihleh bang hangin Moses in mi khatpeuh makna lai gelhsakin a zi masak thei ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot uh ciangin
verses.8: Jesu in, “Note, hilhzawhin na om loh manun Moses in hih bangin ngeina a omsak thei ahi hi. Ahi zongin a kipat cil-in tua bang na hi lo hi.
verses.9: Note kiangah kong genin ah: Mi khatpeuh in midang tawh a zi a mawhna lobuang, a zi a mak a, numei dang tawh a ten leh numei tunga mawh ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
verses.10: Tua ciangin a nungzuite in Jesu kiangah, “Nupa thu tua bang ding ahihleh kiteeng vet kei lehang hoih zaw ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
verses.11: Ahi zongin Jesu in, “Hih ngeina pen mi khempeuh in a zuih zawh ding hi lo a, Pasian in a tua ci dingin a sehte bek in a zui zo ding uh ahi hi.
verses.12: Mi pawl khat a pianpihin geh sa bang om a, pawl khatte a kiget tawm om a, pawl khatte pen vantung ki-ukna hangin geh bangin a om hi. Geh bangin a om zote om tahen,” a ci hi.
verses.13: Tua ciangin mi pawl khat in a naupangte uh tungah Jesu in a khut nga-in thu a ngetsak nading deihin a naupangte uh a hong paipih uh hi. Ahi zongin a nungzuite in tua mite na taii uh hi.
verses.14: Jesu in, “Vantung ki-ukna pen naupangte tawh a kibang mite ading ahih manin, tua naupangte ka kiangah hong paipihsak unla, khaktan kei un,” a ci hi.
verses.15: Tua ciangin Jesu in naupangnote tungah a khut nga-in thupha a piak khit ciangin a paikhia hi.
verses.16: Khat vei, Jesu kiangah mi khat hong pai a, “Sia aw, nuntak tawntungna ka ngah nadingin bang gamtat hoih gamta ding ka hi hiam?” ci-in a hong dong hi.
verses.17: Jesu in, “Bang hangin bang hoih hiam cih thu hong dong na hi hiam? A hoih khat bek om hi. Nuntak tawntungna sungah na lut nop leh thukhamte na zui in,” ci-in a dawng hi.
verses.18: Amah in, “Bang thukhamte ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin Jesu in, “Mi that kei in; numei tungah mawh kei in; mi neihsa gu kei in; zuau thu gen kei in;
verses.19: na nu na pa zahtak in; nang na ki-it bangin na veengte na it in, cihnate ahi hi,” a ci hi.
verses.20: Tua ciangin tangvalpa in, “Hihte khempeuh ka zuih sa ahi hi; bang kisam lai ding ka hi hiam?” a cih ciangin
verses.21: Jesu in, “Mi cingtaak na hih nop leh pai-in na neihsate va zuak inla, na sum khotte, mizawngte tungah va pia lecin, vantungah sum na hau ding hi. Tua ciangin hong pai inla kei hong zui in,” a ci hi.
verses.22: Tangvalpa in hih thu a zak ciangin, amah hau mahmah ahih manin, mai khingin a paikhia hi.
verses.23: Tua ciangin Jesu in a nungzuite kiangah, “A mantak a kong genin ah: Mihau khat pen vantung ki-ukna sungah a lut ding haksa mahmah ding hi.
verses.24: A dang khat hong gen leuleu ning: Pasian ukna sungah mihau khat a lut ding sangin phim bilvang sungah kalaoh khat a lut ding baih zaw lai hi,” a ci hi.
verses.25: Nungzuite in hih thu a zak uh ciangin lamdang sa mahmah uh a, “Kua in hotkhiatna ngah zo ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
verses.26: Ahi zongin Jesu in amaute enin, “Mihingteʼ hih zawh ding hi lo mah hi; ahi zongin Pasian in na khempeuh hih thei hi,” a ci hi.
verses.27: Tua ciangin Peter in, “Kote in na khempeuh nusia-in nang ka hong zui uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin bang ngah ding ka hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin
verses.28: Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Keʼn limtak a kong genin ah: A hong tung ding hun thak sungah a minthanna tokhom tungah Mihing Tapa a tut hun ciangin kei a hong zui note zong, tokhom sawm le nihte tung mahah tu-in Israel minam sawm le nihte tungah thukhenin na om ding uh hi.
verses.29: Keima hangin a inn, a sanggam numei, a sanggam pasal, a nu, a pa, a tate, a leitang, khat peuhpeuh a nusiate in a zah za khat ngahkikin, nuntak tawntungna zong a ngah ding uh hi.
verses.30: Ahi zongin tu hun laitakin a lian mi tampite tua hun ciangin a neu suak dinga, tu hun laitakin a neu tampite tua hun ciangin a lian hi ding uh hi.
